entity_types.name: entity
entity_types.description: Conversational insights encompassing unique and innovative perspectives or solutions that were not anticipated

entity_types.name: concept
entity_types.description: Topics that came up that people held different views on

entity_types.name: person
entity_types.description: Descriptions of their persona and worldview derived from introduction

entity_types.name: occurance
entity_types.description: A reference to a specific action or event that is especially important to the context

entity_types.name: sentiment
entity_types.description: A reference to a sentiment or emotion that is especially important to the context

entity_types.name: timespace
entity_types.description: A reference to a time and/or place that is especially important to the context.
